Text:
It's real, and it sucks compared to the first game.  You can't tell what's happening on-screen.  I'm so glad I didn't buy this one.  Though I totally appreciate the effort it took to bring it to the trackers (I snagged it off of USENET).

Chalk up another write-off under Bobby Kotick and Activision.
